author: cnbc.com
title: Unitas Global Acquires Solinea
text:
LOS ANGELES, Unitas Global , the leading enterprise hybrid cloud solution provider, announces today the acquisition of Solinea, Inc. , dedicated to helping enterprise organizations adopt hybrid cloud solutions and drive digital transformation. An expert at developing comprehensive enterprise hybrid cloud adoption strategies, the Solinea team will further solidify Unitas Global’s position as a trusted advisor and partner to its clients.
Solinea, Inc.
Unitas Global’s acquisition of Solinea strengthens its ability to provide customers with seamless cloud adoption for end-to-end hybrid cloud solutions. Together, Solinea and Unitas Global solve common adoption challenges including transforming complex, fragmented legacy IT solutions, embracing cultural challenges, and addressing skillset gaps. By leveraging this integrated set of capabilities, clients will be able to continuously innovate along their path to cloud adoption.
“By acquiring Solinea, Unitas Global enhances its ability to deliver targeted business outcomes in partnership with our clients, expanding beyond our current core competencies as an infrastructure-focused service provider,” says Patrick Shutt, CEO of Unitas Global. “This will immediately give our clients a single trusted partner to help with cloud strategy enablement, adoption, and cloud infrastructure management.”
“In addition to developing cloud adoption strategies, the Solinea acquisition brings new services to the Unitas Global offering. These include multi-cloud design and implementation, container and microservices (Kubernetes) enablement, managed DevOps-as-a-Service, CI/CD pipeline tooling and management, and application migration expertise,” comments Grant Kirkwood, CTO of Unitas Global. “We plan to build on these services to create a next-generation cloud transformation platform for our enterprise clients.”
These additional services are key to building an industry-leading transformational cloud platform and result in a next-generation end-to-end cloud service partner for Unitas’ enterprise clients.
“Solinea’s offerings together with Unitas Global’s expertise will deliver an integrated set of capabilities that will enable our clients to continuously innovate as they fully embrace the cloud,” shares Francesco Paola, CEO of Solinea. “This unique opportunity places Unitas in the optimal position to provide clients the expertise they need to accelerate and simplify their cloud adoption strategies.”
Unitas Global was named to the Inc 5000 List of Fastest-Growing Companies in America and the 2017 CRN Fast Growth 150 list.
For more information about Unitas Global, visit www.unitasglobal.com .
For more information about Solinea, visit www.solinea.com .
About Unitas Global
Unitas Global is a leading provider of enterprise hybrid cloud solutions. The Unitas Enterprise Private Cloud (EPC) solution provides clients with custom, highly secure, and dedicated cloud-based IT environments that are easy-to-consume, fully managed, and backed by an end-to-end SLA, guaranteeing application uptime. By offloading day-to-day infrastructure operations to Unitas Global, our clients are able to refocus and optimize their internal IT resources toward their business-centric initiatives. Unitas is headquartered in Los Angeles, with clients and locations spanning the globe. For more information, please visit www.unitasglobal.com .
About Solinea
Solinea is a leading cloud adoption consulting firm focused on accelerating adoption of enterprise hybrid cloud solutions. Through its proven consulting and training offerings, we help enterprises adopt cloud computing solutions and the supporting ecosystems including Cloud Infrastructure, DevOps & Automation, Containers & Microservices, driving Application Migration to the cloud. Led by experts who have designed, deployed and operated production cloud infrastructure at scale for clients worldwide, Solinea is technology agnostic, helping clients select the right infrastructure platforms, design the right agile processes and toolchains, and adopt orchestrated containers in production to achieve their business objectives. For more information, please visit www.solinea.com .
